hadith.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The first Sura in which a prostration was mentioned, was Sura An-Najm (The Star). Allah's Messenger (ï·º) prostrated (while reciting it), and everybody behind him prostrated except a man whom I saw taking a hand-full of dust in his hand and prostrated on it. Later I saw that man killed as an infidel, and he was Umaiya bin Khalaf
